name: Chickpea Salad Recipe
description: Pair this fresh and zesty Chickpea Salad Recipe with more picnic-ready sides or summer grilling. Itâ€™s easy to assemble, full of flavor and naturally gluten free. Sure to be a hit at any potluck!
recipeIngredient: 2 (15-ounce) cans chickpeas, drained and rinsed (3 cups cooked chickpeas)
1 medium english cucumber, diced (about 2 cups chopped)
1/4 cup fresh dill, chopped small (or parsley)
1/4 teaspoon salt, or more to taste

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, add the drained and rinsed chickpeas, cucumber, cherry tomatoes, red onion, fresh dill and avocado.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large bowl, add the drained and rinsed chickpeas, cucumber, cherry tomatoes, red onion, fresh dill and avocado.

recipeInstructions.text: Make the dressing: In a small bowl, whisk together the dressing ingredients to combine.
recipeInstructions.name: Make the dressing: In a small bowl, whisk together the dressing ingredients to combine.

recipeInstructions.text: Pour the dressing over the salad, and stir to mix. Refrigerate until ready to serve.
recipeInstructions.name: Pour the dressing over the salad, and stir to mix. Refrigerate until ready to serve.

recipeInstructions.text: Will keep for 3-4 days in the refrigerator. Enjoy!
recipeInstructions.name: Will keep for 3-4 days in the refrigerator. Enjoy!
